title: A Wind Tunnel Killer? Body Rocket Launches First on-Bike Drag Sensor for Real-Time Aero Testing
content:
British startup Body Rocket is on a mission to make aerodynamic optimization as available and commonplace as power training.

Read the full article at A Wind Tunnel Killer? Body Rocket Launches First on-Bike Drag Sensor for Real-Time Aero Testing on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
